io.github.teamfractal.entity

Class PlayerTest.MarketPurchaseCustomisationParamaterisedTests

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.teamfractal.entity.PlayerTest.MarketPurchaseCustomisationParamaterisedTests
  • Enclosing class:
    PlayerTest

    public static class PlayerTest.MarketPurchaseCustomisationParamaterisedTests
extends java.lang.Object
    Runs parameterised tests on Player.purchaseCustomisationFromMarket(ResourceType, Roboticon, Market) using many different values and ensures that the correct changes are made to various attributes of the player and roboticon and the correct value is returned by the method.
    Author:
    jcn509

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MarketPurchaseCustomisationParamaterisedTests(io.github.teamfractal.entity.enums.PurchaseStatus purchaseStatus, int initialMoney, io.github.teamfractal.entity.enums.ResourceType customisation, int expectedMoneyRemoved, io.github.teamfractal.entity.enums.ResourceType expectedRoboticonCustomisation)
      Runs before each test and sets up the values of the variables needed by the test

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.util.Collection customisationPurchaseValues()
      Defines the values to be used in each test
      void roboticonCustomisationCorrect()
      Tests Player.purchaseCustomisationFromMarket(ResourceType, Roboticon, Market) ensures that when a player attempts to purchase a customisation from the market the roboticon used ends up with the correct customisation
      void setup()
      Runs before every test and creates the necessary objects
      void testCorrectMoneyRemoved()
      Tests Player.purchaseCustomisationFromMarket(ResourceType, Roboticon, Market) ensures that the correct amount of money is removed from a player's inventory when they attempt to purchase a customisation
      void testPurchaseCustomisationReturnedValue()
      Tests Player.purchaseCustomisationFromMarket(ResourceType, Roboticon, Market) ensures that the correct value is returned when a player tries to purchase a customisation

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • MarketPurchaseCustomisationParamaterisedTests

        public MarketPurchaseCustomisationParamaterisedTests(io.github.teamfractal.entity.enums.PurchaseStatus purchaseStatus,
                                                     int initialMoney,
                                                     io.github.teamfractal.entity.enums.ResourceType customisation,
                                                     int expectedMoneyRemoved,
                                                     io.github.teamfractal.entity.enums.ResourceType expectedRoboticonCustomisation)
        Runs before each test and sets up the values of the variables needed by the test
        Parameters:
        purchaseStatus - The result returned by the method call
        initialMoney - The amount of money that the player has in their inventory before the test is run
        customisation - The customisation that the player should purchase
        expectedMoneyRemoved - The amount of money that should be removed from the player's inventory
        expectedRoboticonCustomisation - The customisation type that the roboticon should have after the test
